question: 懇談
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>courteous</kanji> <kanji>discussion</kanji> is a little more formal than a friendly talk (because it's a discussion), but it's still fairly informal on the discussion scale, making it an <vocabulary>informal talk</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
